authors: Garth Ennis, John McCrea and James Hodgkins
description: The Thousand is a fictional character, a comic book supervillain and enemy of Spider-Man in the Marvel Comics Universe. Created in combination by Garth Ennis, John McCrea and James Hodgkins, the character first appears in Tangled Web of Spider-Man #1.
name: Thousand
powers: Body is composed of one-thousand spiders capable of devouring the innards of humans
using their leftover skin like a suit
